org.jenkinsci.plugins.github.pullrequest.title: SapMachine #747: Vitals: display commit state on Linux
org.jenkinsci.plugins.github.pullrequest.body:
Add a column to the output - linux only - which displays overcommit state. Helps in analyzing allocation- and thread/fork-failures.
Looks like this:
``` 1 Vitals: 2 ------------system------------ <snip> 4 crt: Committed-to-Commit-Limit ratio (percent) <snip> 51 Short Term Values: 52 -------------------system------------------- -------------------process-------------------- ------------------------------------jvm------------------------------------ 53 -------cpu------- -------rss------- -cpu- ---io--- --heap--- ---------meta--------- ----jthr----- --cldg-- ---cls---- 54 Time avail crt swap si so pr pb us sy id wa st gu virt all anon file shm swdo us sy of rd wr thr comm used comm used csc csu gctr code mlc num nd cr st num anon num ld uld 55 56 2020-11-02 11:19:03 10,5g 108 256k 3 0 6,6g 69m 37m 32m 0k 0k 2 18 254m 3m 192k 111k 64k 2k 21m 7m 0k 9 1 16m 3 0 447 ```
Column "crt" shows overcommit state, in percent (108 in my case)
fixes #747
